methods.name: select(square)
methods.params: square - where the piece you want to select is
methods.description: selects a piece at the given position if one exists and returns or fale otherwise.

methods.name: unselect()
methods.description: unselects the currently selected piece if one exists and returns false otherwise.

methods.name: move(to)
methods.description: moves the currently selected piece to the given position iff it is a valid move and false otherwise. *only works when a piece is selected

methods.name: take(to)
methods.description: like move but only works when said move captures another piece. *only works when a piece is selected

methods.name: isValidMove(to)
methods.description: returns true if the given position is a vlid move for the selected piece if one exists and false otherwise. *only works when a piece is selected

methods.name: isValidMove(from, to)
methods.params: from - source square, to - destination square
methods.description: returns true if the given position is a vlid move for the selected piece if one exists and false otherwise. *only works when a piece is selected

methods.name: getValidMoves()
methods.description: returns all valid moves for the current position.

methods.name: getValidMoves(square)
methods.params: square - the square you want ot see the moves for
methods.description: returns all valid moves for the piece at the given square.

methods.name: showValidMoves()
methods.description: shows all the valid moves of the selected piece if one exists and false otherwise.

methods.name: hideValidMoves()
methods.description: hides all the valid moves of the selected piece if one exists and false otherwise.

methods.name: showMoveHistory()
methods.description: prints the move history for both players in the terminal or returns false if no moves have been played.

methods.name: showWhiteMoves()
methods.description: prints the move history for white in the terminal or returns false if no moves have been played.

methods.name: showBlackMoves()
methods.description: prints the move history for black in the terminal or returns false if no moves have been played.

methods.name: startGame()
methods.description: initiates the start of a game.

methods.name: offerDraw()
methods.description: offers a draw to the opponent.

methods.name: resign()
methods.description: resigns the game.

methods.name: resetBoard()
methods.description: resets the board, can only be called when the previous game has finished.

methods.name: getFEN()
methods.description: returns the FEN string denoting the current state of the game.

methods.name: runScript(scriptName)
methods.params: scriptName - name of the script to run
methods.description: runs a saved script if one exists under the given name. no delay is used.

methods.name: testScript()
methods.description: test the script as is entered in the editor. runs with a delay between moves.

methods.name: saveScript(scriptName)
methods.params: scriptName - name to save the script under
methods.description: saves the script under a certain name.

methods.name: setBoardTheme(theme)
methods.params: theme - the name of the theme you want to use (bDark, bLight, bPurple, bBlue, bGreen, or bOrange)
methods.description: changes the color theme of the board.

methods.name: setBotDepth(depth)
methods.params: depth - the new depth for the bot to operate at (0-6)
methods.description: changes how many moves ahead the bot will look.

methods.name: playAs(color)
methods.params: color - the color you want to start as (w or b)
methods.description: sets the color you play as.

methods.name: help(method)
methods.description: displays use case information for the given method so you don't have to come to the docs.

methods.name: clear()
methods.description: clears the terminal.
